Loading animation

  • Usage guidelines
  • Basic loader
  • Complex loader

Usage Guidelines

The loading animation component is used to let the user know the system is working and to wait for the result. It can be used at the component level to indicate that something will be updated there, or at the page level when the entire page is being loaded.

Do

  • Loading time of 1 second or longer requires a loading animation

Don't

  • Use in place of missing content or data
  • Leave on the page after content has finished loading

Basic Loader

The smaller version is typically used within another component, such as a sidebar, search dropdown, or login form.

Complex Loader

This larger variation requires much more room, so it's best used when an entire page is being loaded.
